message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire something truly valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,600,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value our potential partnership, $1,600,000 is unfortunately not enough for me to part with this product.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,650,000.  This would still allow me a reasonable profit and provides you with a great deal. What do you say?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I would like to offer $1,625,000 for it. I believe this price is fair for both parties and I look forward to your consideration.
